1013.issue: [W1013] Please test whether adapter can support compact mode, if not set "common.compact:false" at [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json).

1029.issue: [E1029] Admin support not specified. Please add "common.adminUI.config = json|materialize|html|none"

1032.issue: [W1032] Many "common.news" found in [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json). Repository builder will truncate at 7 news. Please remove old news.

1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json).

1068.issue: [W1068] "common.keywords" should not contain "iobroker, adapter, smart home" [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json)

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json).

1105.issue: [W1105] [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json) schema validation error: Missing required property "titleLang" in /common

2004.issue: [E2004] Versions "0.2.9, 0.2.8, 0.2.4, 0.2.3, 0.2.2, 0.2.0" listed at common.news at [io-package.json](https://github.com/soef/ioBroker.lightify/blob/master/io-package.json) do not exist at [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.lightify). Please remove from news section.

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.
